text: Richwood is a suburb situated on the northern outskirts of Cape Town, South Africa and is about north-east of the city centre alongside the N7 freeway. According to the 2011 census it has a population of 2,988 residents in 963 households. The name is a portmanteau of "Richmond Park" and "Goodwood". ==References== Category:Suburbs of Cape Town
title: Richwood, Cape Town
